item.title: ItemonItem help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:10, topic:397434”]Actually when you do this in RuneScape, whenever you use one item on the black mask it uses all of the items in your inventory that are required to make the slayer mask.[/quote]Meh, easier this way so noobs on servers don’t try to rage.

OT: Thanks as always babe <3

Read full topic

item.title: ItemonItem help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:8, topic:397434”][quote=I Vain I]

if (itemUsed == 4164 && (useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 4551 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 4166 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 4551 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 4168 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4551 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 4551 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 8901 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 4551)) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(4164, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4166, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4168, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4551, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(8901, 1)) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerCrafting] > 54) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSlayer] > 34) { c.getItems().deleteItem(4164, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4164), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4166, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4166), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4168, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4168), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4551, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4551), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(8901, c.getItems().getItemSlot(8901), 1); c.getItems().addItem(13263, 1); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Slayer level of 35 or higher to make a Slayer Helmet."); return; } } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Crafting level of 55 or higher to make a Slayer Helmet."); return; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have all the parts to make a Slayer Helmet."); return; } }

add my MSN if you need anymore help: i.vain.i@hotmail.com
[/quote][/quote]

Or that

Read full topic

item.title: ItemonItem help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[code=Java] if (itemUsed == 4164 && (useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 4551 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 4166 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 4551 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 4168 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4551 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 4551 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 8901) || itemUsed == 8901 && (useWith == 4164 || useWith == 4166 || useWith == 4168 || useWith == 4551)) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(4164, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4166, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4168, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4551, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(8901, 1)) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerCrafting] > 54) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSlayer] > 34) { c.getItems().deleteItem(4164, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4164), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4166, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4166), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4168, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4168), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4551, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4551), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(8901, c.getItems().getItemSlot(8901), 1); c.getItems().addItem(13263, 1); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Slayer level of 35 or higher to make a Slayer Helmet."); return; } } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Crafting level of 55 or higher to make a Slayer Helmet."); return; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have all the parts to make a Slayer Helmet."); return; } }[/code]

add my MSN if you need anymore help: i.vain.i@hotmail.com

I am assuming it can’t read the int?[/quote]

item.title: ItemonItem help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Let me try this one
…

if (itemUsed == HELM_PARTS && useWith == HELM_PARTS) {
			if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSlayer] >= 35 && c.playerLevel[c.playerCrafting] >= 55) {
				c.getItems().deleteItem(4164, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4164),1);
				c.getItems().deleteItem(4166, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4166),1);
				c.getItems().deleteItem(4168, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4168),1);
				c.getItems().deleteItem(4551, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4551),1);
				c.getItems().deleteItem(8901, c.getItems().getItemSlot(8901),1);
				c.getItems().addItem(13263,1);
				c.sendMessage("You fit all the pieces together to a compact slayer helmet.");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need at least 35 slayer and 55 crafting to create this helmet.");
			}
		}

That’s the main method , you will also need this :

public static int[] HELM_PARTS = {4164, 4166, 4168, 4551, 8901};

I’m not sure if it works , it should though

Read full topic

item.title: ItemonItem help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Okay I will try…

Id = 4164 has to be used with any of the following id’s

4166, 4168, 4551, 8901
Items are as followed
4164 = nose peg
4166 = facemask
4168 = earmuff
4551 = spiny helmet
8901 = black mask

the process is you must have all items selected above in your inventory and have 55 crafting and 35 slayer to create the slayer helmet.

Using only two items on each other would not do the trick because you cant create a half mask you know? So it has to recognize all items and level requirements are there.

After you use the items together it would create the slayer helmet 13263 if I remember correctly. It would delete all items in the process of creating the slayer helmet(except the skills of course).

Read full topic

item.title: ItemonItem help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Tell me what is used on what // gets what // does what[/quote]if (itemUsed == 4164 && useWith == 4166 && useWith == 4168 && useWith == 4551 && useWith == 8901 || itemUsed == 8901 && useWith == 4551 && useWith == 4168 && useWith == 4166 && useWith == 4164) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerCrafting] >= 55) { } else if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSlayer] >= 35) { c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed),1); c.getItems().addItem(13263,1); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Slayer level of 35 and 55 Crafting to make the slayer helmet."); } } one of the items in the top line has to be used with one of the other id’s on the top. After one of the id’s are used on each other it uses them all to create one item.(the id near the bottom the 13263). before it creates the item it checks to see if you have the level requirements ( 55 craft and 35 slayer).

I had a thought about looking at how it is made for the godsword shards but I cant seem to find them now…

Read full topic

if (itemUsed == 4164 && useWith == 4166 && useWith == 4168 && useWith == 4551 && useWith == 8901 || itemUsed == 8901 && useWith == 4551 && useWith == 4168 && useWith == 4166 && useWith == 4164) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerCrafting] >= 55) { } else if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSlayer] >= 35) { c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed),1); c.getItems().addItem(13263,1); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Slayer level of 35 and 55 Crafting to make the slayer helmet."); } }

I get no compiler errors however I use the items on each other and they do not work. Any tips? Or am I forgetting something?
